Firstly;
  • At the next step file permissions are necessary for Blogsa setup will be checked.

  • But if you setup with Access It is necessary to give permission for web.config and App_Data folder for writing.
  • This function is necessary to setup Blogsa healthy.
To complete setup successfully it is necessary to give write permission folders and files below :

You setup Blogsa successfully !

To reach Admin Panel It is enough to write "/Admin" after your web site url. The login Information for Admin Panel:

Username : admin
Password : {Password}

For running successfully dont forget to make Settings on your admin panel.!
For your security dont forget to delete Setup folder on your main folder.

• For the best performance Blogsa suggests Microsoft SQL Server 2005 database type.
  • For Microsoft SQL 2005 database; if you setup for your web site service provider must support Microsoft SQL 2005. if you setup for your computer, there must be Microsoft SQL 2005 Express Edition version at least. Thank you for choosing Blogsa! Blogsa is already installed on your site.

If you want to install Blogsa again, Delete <add key="Setup" value="Ok" /> line on Web.config file and restart Setup page.
